title: Guide to Plant Fiber Cordage
summaries: The Guide to Plant Fiber Cordage is an accessory that, when equipped, allows the player to collect Vine Rope when destroying vines. It can be found inside surface Chests or in Wooden Crates obtained from fishing. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be purchased at the Skeleton Merchant for 250 during First Quarter.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the collection of Vine Rope from vines
statistics.Buy: 250
statistics.Sell: 50
